item.description:
Since the South End is the brunch capital of Boston- let's check it out! We will confirm the headcount the week before, and make reservations for our group.

For those of you not familiar with the South End, it's a great neighborhood to walk around. They also have an open market on Harrison Ave on Sundays- maybe we can walk over afterwards. We have never been to Stella but have heard great things about it. Check out their website here: www.bostonstella.com.

For transportation, I'd suggest the Orange line to Back Bay- it's about a 10 minute walk. Parking can be tough in the South End, particularly on Sunday mid-mornings.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We will make reservations under Keuning.
item.why: This is a great way to meet new people in a relaxing environment, and enjoy great food!
item.name: Sunday Brunch at Stella
